title: East Anglian holiday
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/East Anglia (England) - Description and travel
description: Describes the beauty and historical associations of the East Anglia district of England. Mentions the open country of Norfolk as being a delight of gardeners and naturalists; and the lushness of Suffolk made famous by Constable. Includes shots of the "Broads", home of sails, windmills and quiet waterways, Flatford and Horstead Mills and the old town of King's Lynn. Narrated by Frank Duncan and Richard George.
